# ultrawork-ts

TypeScript/Node.js cross-platform version of ultrawork plugin.

## Key Differences from Bash Version

- All scripts are TypeScript compiled to JavaScript
- No jq dependency - native JSON parsing
- No bash dependency - runs with Node.js
- Cross-platform file paths using path.join()
- Same stdin/stdout JSON contracts for hooks

## File Structure

- src/lib/types.ts - TypeScript interfaces
- src/lib/file-lock.ts - Cross-platform file locking
- src/lib/session-utils.ts - Session management utilities
- src/scripts/*.ts - CLI scripts
- src/hooks/*.ts - Lifecycle hooks
- dist/ - Compiled JavaScript (generated)
